name: Cstbox.github.io
body:
### CSTBox

A toolkit for creating embedded applications for smart buildings. 

# Introducing CSTBox.

Need reasons to use CSTBox ? Look no further.

## In a few words.

Technical details are not your cup of tea and you don't need obscure speeches ? Here is a quick overview written for you. 

## Makes you free.

Build applications by assembling existing components, use your preferred language for adding yours, and lots more... 

## Open the hood.

CSTBox project is available on GitHub to help passionated people seeing how it works, doing awesome stuff with it and making it better.

# Built with CSTBox.

## Ambient assisted living.

[GERHOME](http://gerhome.cstb.fr/), [Adorha](http://adorha.cep-cicat.com/), [SIGAAL](http://sigaal.org/) 

## Laboratory control and monitoring.

[Semi-virtual test bench](http://www.cstb.fr/fileadmin/documents/telechargements/Developpez_et_optimisez_performances_energetiques_et_environnementales__produits.pdf) 

## Energy usage efficiency.

Here are some of the projects using CSTBox inside.
 
[EnPROVE](http://www.enprove.eu/), [EcoFamilies](http://www.ictusagelab.fr/projet/ecofamilies), [Ecoffices](http://www.ecoffices.com/), [ENERGIHAB](http://extranet.cstb.fr/sites/energihab/default.aspx)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
